posts.post_content:
Working on the back run.  Can anyone help me out with these?  

[STRIKE]SC150 f30[/STRIKE] - Thanks Tyler!
SC350 f30
SC350 f25
Piedmont 350

Let me know what you have!

thanks

Tony
Now I know who picked up the SGC 10 hindu last night.... ;)
Yup, I got it for a good price.  I was very pleased.  Struck out on everything else last night that I wanted, but that's ok!  No just four more....

At the 10 second mark, I elected to not bid on the Hindu.  Glad I didn't push the price up, but was surprised that the price did not move in the last 10 seconds--second rarest card of the back run (Old Mill is SUPER tough).
Dave

Tyler

Thanks to Tyler, picked up one more.

Any one else got one out there?  Just need the 350s and I'm just looking for a "cleaner" back... it can be a beater.

thanks

Tony
